definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Quietly elegant perfume, delicacy without fastidiousness, makes females even more charming.
sentences.chinese: 雅而不俗的淡雅香水，尽显女性魅力。

sentences.english: More than 2,000 women aged 18-34 were  interviewed for the poll.
sentences.chinese: 共有两千多名18岁至34岁的女性参与了该项调查。

sentences.english: If Saturn be in Aquarius, he will be a mere woman-hater.
sentences.chinese: 如果土星位于水瓶座，盘主会很讨厌女性。

sentences.english: This year we had twenty-seven young women enter.
sentences.chinese: 今年我们有27名年轻女性新加入。

sentences.english: This eye disease in menstrual quantity is little or no period of women.
sentences.chinese: 这种眼病多见于月经量少或无月经的女性。

sentences.english: In the past few years, however, there has been an upsurge of research into the female sexual response.
sentences.chinese: 但在过去的几年里，对女性性反应的研究骤然升温。

sentences.english: Tabb is the first woman to referee a world snooker championship final.
sentences.chinese: 塔普是第一位在斯诺克世锦赛决赛中担当裁判的女性。

sentences.english: The F14 offers compact package dimensions and a pluggable pin header.
sentences.chinese: 在女性14例提供了紧凑的封装尺寸和可插入针。

sentences.english: Both Zhang Ailing and Wang Anyi have strong female awareness.
sentences.chinese: 张爱玲与王安忆都有着鲜明的女性意识。

sentences.english: Nowadays weight-losing has become popular among young and middle-aged women.
sentences.chinese: 当今女性减肥已成为一种时尚。

sentences.english: Women, for instance, make up only 13% of contributors.
sentences.chinese: 再比方说女性在参与者中，仅占了13%的比例。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, just a quarter of auditors moving to in-house roles in the City are women.
sentences.chinese: 同时，伦敦城内四分之一改为坐班的审计师为女性。

sentences.english: The cardigans and leggings as soft as silk endow ladies with particular charm.
sentences.chinese: 柔情似水的毛衣裙装赋予女性独特的魅力。

sentences.english: Female citizens may be recruited for active service according to the army's need in accordance with the preceding paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 根据军队需要，可以按前款规定征集女性公民服现役。

sentences.english: Female patients can not be used during pregnancy phototherapy treatment.
sentences.chinese: 女性患者在怀孕期间不能使用光疗的治疗方法。

sentences.english: Second, are female-headed households over-represented among the poor?
sentences.chinese: 第二，女性户主家庭是否有更高的贫困发生率。
